title: Test Campaign
call_to_action: This is a test unsponsored campaign.
solution_support: Sandwiches help self esteem and hunger.
solution_copy: Be American! Drink coffee to stay awake! DoSomething.org recommends 3 or more cups per day.
items_needed:
* Fresh coffee beans
* Aeropress or Chemex
* Hot water
vips: Celestial at Birch Coffee knows what's up.
time_and_place: Early in the morning. Mid-afternoon. Actually, all day long. Don't sleep.
promoting_tips: You're going to be very hyped. From caffeine.
location_finder_copy: Seriously, just get some beans. But also get a cold brew while you're there.
pre_step_copy: You'll need to find some 'fee, fast. Find Maxwell Watson.
photo_step: Take a photo of yourself and Maxwell enjoying your 'fee.
post_step_copy: Put that photo on the group drive so all the other interns can enjoy admire your fantastic success! You should drink a celebratory espresso.
reportback_copy: Man, that's fine! Drink an espresso to celebrate!
reportback_confirm_msg: You sure drank that 'fee. Good work!
